text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 1996. ==Events== *9 March - Lisa del Bo is selected to represent Belgium at the 1996 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Liefde is een kaartspel". She is selected to be the fortieth Belgian Eurovision entry during Eurosong held at the Knokke Casino in Knokke. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1990s=== *Samson en Gert (1990–present) *Familie (1991–present) *Wittekerke (1993-2008) *Thuis (1995–present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== {| class="wikitable" |- " ! title: 1996 in Belgian television
